Translations.Text: GOD JE JEDEN ZASVATIT creation repeats it Ultimately ona spatny listok Him
Dni when Hodiny pojdem ist okolo guilty will lak
Ich idols nie have power intercede ich behalf; on the contrary they disown ich idols
Dni when Hodiny pojdem ist okolo they part podnik
Mat rad for those verit lead righteous zivot they bol Raj rejoicing
Mat rad for those disbelieve zamietnut our revelations schodza Hereafter they posledny retribution forever
Therefore ona glorify GOD when ona retire o night, when ona vzostup v the rano
All chvalit bol due do Him heavens zem vecer i mat rad tvoj dni
He produces zit dead produces dead zit He revives zem it umrel; ona similarly resurrected
